thread.title: US Tennessee university shooting: One dead and two injured
thread.title_full: US Tennessee university shooting: One dead and two injured

author: Lyzza
title: US Tennessee university shooting: One dead and two injured
text: NEWS OCT 14 2015, 9:48 AM ET Three Shot at Off-Campus Party Near Tennessee State University: Police by ERIK ORTIZ This was not a university-sanctioned party ... Unfortunately, it happened close to the campus, but we don't have anything to do with that," said senior Steven Preshon. Either the reporting regarding this incident is lousy, or you are referencing a different shooting. 3 students shot at house party near a Nashville university NASHVILLE, Tenn. â€” Police say three students have been wounded by gunfire, including one shot in the head, at an off-campus party near Tennessee State University in Nashville. Metro Nashville Police Lt. Danny Haley told The Tennessean ( 3 injured in shooting at party near TSU identified ) that officers went to a home across the street from the campus after receiving 911 calls of shots fired. Haley says witnesses told officers the shooting began soon after three armed males arrived at the home and were turned away from the party. Three wounded, none fatally (so far) at an off campus party. And 4 people shot, one fatally on Tennessee State University campus - CBS News NASHVILLE, Tenn. -- Authorities say a man was killed and three women wounded in a shooting at Tennessee State University in Nashville Thursday night. The gunman was at large early Friday, the campus was on lockdown and classes were cancelled for the day. According to the Metropolitan Nashville Police Department's verified Twitter account, the gunfire was apparently prompted by a dispute over a dice game in an outdoor courtyard. One killed, three wounded at a dice game on campus. Lyzza's post referenced the latter. Thanks from RNG and Lyzza
